Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by New York in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2015, off William Halsey (BRO)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/2015, off James Stults (SLB)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2015, hitting .476 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2015, hitting .373 with 7 HR, 21 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2015, hitting .412 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2015, hitting .542 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $20,795,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2016, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 6/14/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2016, hitting .423 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/2016, hitting .440 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2016, hitting .373 with 9 HR, 26 RBI...
9/1/2016: Signed a contract extension with New York , $22,300,000 per year, for 5 years.
Had 6 hits with 4 RBI against Brooklyn on 9/10/2016...
Injured on 9/27/2016 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Won MVP in 2016, hitting .344 with 36 HR, 95 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2017, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2017, hitting .354 with 8 HR, 26 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2017, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Seattle, driving in 4 runs on 9/2/2017...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2018, hitting .402 with 3 HR, 26 RBI...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won MVP in 2018, hitting .314 with 28 HR, 101 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2019, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 14 RBI...
